channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security Access Manager for Web
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Security Access Manager for Web

item.title: CVE-2017-1489|2024-08-05T13:32:29.832Z -- ibm -- security%20access%20manager%20for%20web
item.description: IBM Security Access Manager 6.1, 7.0, 8.0, and 9.0 e-community configurations may be affected by a redirect vulnerability. ECSSO Master Authentication can redirect to a server not participating in an e-community domain. IBM X-Force ID: 128687.
